title: Short-Term Mobile-Assisted Collaborative Elementary English Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Providing a real-time collaborative learning environment utilizing smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can utilize over 10 situational daily English expressions using mobile devices.
Learners enhance real-time communication skills with peers through group-based language task performance.
Learners establish a habit of self-directed language learning at least three times weekly using mobile apps and online communities.

resources: English Learning Mobile Apps (e.g., Quizlet, Duolingo)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
